CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, pg. 8 reads: "Thousands Attend Courier Home, Food Show...9. The artistic Adair California Wine booth was graced beautifully by Miss Margaret Amaker...Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Margaret Amaker holding bottle of wine in front of Adair California Wine booth in Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair, another version
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Hunt Armory (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
